Posts.Content: mistymoley Sorry meant to say it's just of the about the middle of the sternum
Posts.Title: Swelling at top of breast bone

Posts.Content: It is above the sternum. The wind type pain is very uncomfortable, just cannot get comfortable when I go to bed, cannot lie on left side. Because I had lymph nodes removed find it also difficult to even lie on my right side. Am I just paranoid?
Posts.Title: Swelling at top of breast bone

Posts.Content: I had DCIS which was treated with lumpectomy & 3 lymph nodes removed, followed by Chemotherapy and Radiotherapy. I had my first mammogram in March this year which has came back clear. I found a swelling at top of my breast bone some weeks ago for which I had an x-Ray which also came back ok but the swelling is still there. Am I just being paranoid. I'm have constant wind like pain at shoulder level and the bottom of my left side anatriptoline for nerve pain. I also take paracetamol through the day. I don't know what to do next.
Posts.Title: Swelling at top of breast bone

Posts.Content: Thank you Mistymoley for your advice which I am going to take and do something about it. Will let you know how I get on.
